verses.name: Matthew 15:22
verses.text: And, behold, a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts, and cried unto him, saying, Have mercy on me, O Lord, thou Son of David; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil.

verses.name: Matthew 15:23
verses.text: But he answered her not a word. And his disciples came and besought him, saying, Send her away; for she crieth after us.

verses.name: Matthew 15:24
verses.text: But he answered and said, I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel.

verses.name: Matthew 15:25
verses.text: Then came she and worshipped him, saying, Lord, help me.
